price: 60. Ndenge wana oyo akosala (mabe) lokola basalaki ye mpe sima basali ye lisusu mabe, Allah akosunga ye, kasi Allah azali molimbisi mpe alingaka bolimbisi.
arabic: ۞ ذَٰلِكَۖ وَمَنۡ عَاقَبَ بِمِثۡلِ مَا عُوقِبَ بِهِۦ ثُمَّ بُغِيَ عَلَيۡهِ لَيَنصُرَنَّهُ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَفُوٌّ غَفُورٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
